title: Appendix K - All Question Words in this Book

contents.caption: Table 11: All Question Words in this Book
rows: Alin ang bahay mo? = Which is your house?
Ano ang pagkaing yun? = What is that food?
Bakit mo ito kinain? = Why did you eat it?
Kailan siya pumunta? = When did she go?
Kanino mo ito sinabi? = Who did you tell it to?
Kumusta ka na? = How are you now?
Gaano kasaya ang lalaki? = How happy is the man?
Ilan ang anak mo? = How many children do you have?
Magkano ang sasakyan? = How much is the car?
Nakanino ang aso? = Who is the dog with?
Nasaan ang eskwelahan? = Where is the school?
Bata nino yun? = Whose kid is that?
Paano niya binuksan ito? = How did she turn it on?
Saan natutulog si Jessica? = Where is Jessica sleeping?
Sino ang lalaki? = Who is the man?
